content: and yardage ** pattern size - worked at the pattern size pictured here in aqua at 7 repeats of chart 2 my sample used about 675 yards 617 m of the dragon sock yarn mermaid colorway on us 4 3 5 mm needles and measures 64 x 30 163 x 76 cm for the orange kerchief size pictured the sample is knitted up in the rustic fingering gwynn oak colorway 4 repeats of chart 2 will measure about 48 x 22 122 x 56 cm and use about 375 yards 343 m so you could even knit this size with only one skein of sock yarn information about other sizes is included in the pattern
